refnamediv.refpurpose: Finds variance values in an input

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence

listitem.para: Dimension along which the function operates - Row, Column, All or Custom. Default : All

The integer dimension over which the function calculates the minimum. This value cannot exceed the number of dimensions in input. It applies only when 'Dimension' property is set to 'Custom'. Default : 1
It applies only when 'Dimension' property is set to 'All'. It calculates the variance within a particular region of the image. Default : false
vector of y-coordinates of vectices of a rectangle(ROI). Applicable only when 'ROIProcssing' is set to 'true'.
vector of x-coordinates of vectices of a rectangle(ROI). Applicable only when 'ROIProcssing' is set to 'true'.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calculates the variance value in a given image matrix.
